Uses of Package
metaface.client

Packages that use metaface.client
metaface.client   
 

Classes in metaface.client used by metaface.client
HTTPClient
          Implementation of a basic HTTP client for Firewall tunneling.
HTTPListener
          Used by the client's to listen for messages from the HTTPServer Copyright (c) 1996,1997,1998 Sun Microsystems, Inc.
MetaFaceApplet
          This class handles the instanciation of MetaFace in the browser by providing an Applet
MetaFaceClient
          This class defines the base level client behaviour for the MetaFace framework.
MetaFaceIndependentClient
          This class implements the client-side (server free) framework design.
TextControl
          This class is allows text field input for an applet
VHMLOutputReader
          This class is used to construct an eXtensible Markup Language (XML) parser for a Virtual Human Markup Language (VHML) output document.
VHMLOutputTagReader
          This class is used to read pre-rendered Facial Animation Parameters (FAPs), phonemes, Uniform Resource Locators (URLs) and text from an eXtensible Markup Language (XML) file.
